articles.title: Acer's after-sales service systems hacked, data affecting millions of customers stolen - India Today
articles.description: Acer has confirmed a cyber attack on its servers in India through which hackers were able to steal around 60GB of data from the company. The data includes information on the company's clients, retailers and finances.
